description: Vibe guide hook that summarizes verbose tool output

hooks.prompt: If the tool output contains diffs, logs, or technical output longer than 10 lines, summarize it in 2-3 plain sentences. Focus on what changed or what was found. If an error occurred, extract the key problem and suggest a fix in plain language.
